quotes.quote: Sagittarius have smiles that can brighten any room and will always try to make you feel like you belong.
As forgiving as they are, Sagittarius doesn't mind distancing themselves from people, so don't test them.
They can be the sweetest person until you piss them off.
Sagittarians are aliens disguised as humans
A Sagittarius hardly holds grudges. If you ask one about it, he or she will tell you it's old news. They've already moved on.
Sagittarius have a heart of gold and will have no problem settling down with someone who can keep up with them.
A Sagittarius can read people easily, so there's no hiding your feelings from them.
Count on a Sagittarius to help discover a whole new meaning to life.
They know life is too short to be sweating the petty stuff.
Sagittarius are not hot tempered, but when they are, keep your distance.
A Sagittarius can say things to you so bluntly, you won't know if you should be upset or love their honesty.
I'm a Sagittarius, and one of our major qualities is that we're blindly optimistic.
I don't believe in astrology; I'm a Sagittarius and we're skeptical.
A Sagittarius is that one person you can always act like a fool with and take a long drive nowhere with to escape everyday life.
A Sagittarius can look emotionally distant. But in reality, he or she has a big heart.
Nothing about a Sagittarius-born is boring. They know how to get the party started.
As a Sagittarius, you don't have time for people who play mind games because you have better things to do with your time.
While a Sagittarian tends to be candid, there's also a part of them that could be described as being more devious than Pisces, more deceptive than Gemini and more carnal than Scorpio.
Sagittarians have smiles that can brighten any room and will always try to make you feel like you belong.
Sagittarius will give you the world if you wanted it. When they fall for someone it's the real deal.

If you see a guy with a big grin from one ear to the other, winking in a mischievous way and who still looks like a college kid even though his hair is turning grey, then you've probably run into a Sagittarius man.
The Sagittarius man is debonair, footloose and often accused of being a playboy.
Mr Sagittarius likes to postpone for as long as possible.
Sagittarians are not normally sentimental, however, they can get really attached to a favorite sweater that has seen better days.
Average Sagittarius is more interested in contentment and joy than in material gain.
When Sagittarius does get hooked on a venture, he or she is often willing to take risks to secure a profit.
Not all Sagittarius are very interested in home life.
People born under the Sagittarius sign are not keen on luxuries and other displays of wealth.
Even when they settle down, Sagittarius men and women like to keep a small corner of their life just for themselves.
